column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The place is small
column2: so we did wait about 20 minutes on a sunday afternoon around 12:45. I liked the atmosphere
column3: and did not mind sitting at the community table
column4: but just keep in mind you will probably have to sit there if it is busy - by the time we left at 1:25 PM the waiting area was packed! Service is nice
column5: but I leave a 4 star rating because I feel as though Ramen Tatsuya is around a similar price range
column6: has that same depth of flavor
column7: and gives you more for your money. Still
column8: it's definitely a place worth checking out
column9: and I'll return to try the JINYA bun!
